name: Revenant's Revenge: The Orb of Doom
name_original: Revenant's Revenge: The Orb of Doom
description:
Summoned back from the afterlife to fulfill an ancient prophecy, you are tasked with the ultimate mission: to destroy an evil magic orb and defeat an army of the undead that threatens to bring about the end of the world.

This was a school project I had a small amount of time for, I did not make the art in this project.

Controls

WASD/Left stick: movement

Left mouse/Right trigger: attack

Right mouse/Right shoulder: cast spell

E/Button North: Interact

Ctrl/Button West: Sneak

Space/Button South: Dodge

Shift/Botton East: run

 Esc/start: pause
